bangudesc:
Red Book Sisku is a searchable version of the reference grammar of Lojban spoken/logical language.

- Can I use it if I lose internet access?
- Yes, if this happens try opening this very address from this browser.
It should still open. A latest version of Chrome, Safari or Firefox is required.
Press "/" to focus the search field.
To search for rhymes: enter a word and type "@" after it to find its rhymes sorted by relevance. "klama@" is an example.
For advanced users: to enable regular expressions search in titles
either start the string with "^" or end with "$":
"^mi", "gau$" are examples.
For more resources visit Lojban Wiki.

Add as a search engine
title: Lojban dictionary Red Book Sisku
opdescr: Lojban grammar tool: works offline (+ English and other languages)
